NEIGH Name: Maldens and Coombe
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

description: Proposed development as set within phase 1, demolition of derelict sports pavilion building, scope of works document would constitute a material operation. Removal of redundant oil tank including associated concrete bund wall and slab, former pavilion building floor slab, drainage runs and associated manholes.
decision_conditions: The proposed demolition works would constitute a "material operation" carried out in conformity with the approved scheme (ref. 18/15124/FUL).
